response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value for both of us. This unique item is worth $1,000,000 to you, and I believe it could significantly enhance your life or business. My proposal is to offer this product to you at a special price of $900,000, which represents a substantial saving compared to its market value. I trust this offer will allow you to secure an exceptional deal while also ensuring a fair return for me. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 900000}
